attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the "ordinary" working man is finding live difficult, low wages, no rises in income, rising taxes on vehicle fuel (a rip off)-a car is our only way to get to work in most cases-   consider reduction in tax for those who struggle (those earning less than national average wage - not the £20000 being mentioned) and hit those who caused the current problems we are in, they still appear to be rewarded for the very large mistake they made.
